title: Drawing, "Project for the decoration of a horizontal panel", ca. 1775
medium: Pen and black ink on paper with brush and ink wash
provenance:
Collection of Léon Decloux

Ex-coll. of Hippolyte Destailleur (sold, Paris. May 19, 1896 for 100 francs.)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Animal's heads support festoons of hides. Trophies of Dionysiac objects are suspended from the heads. Medallions with Bacchic Representations hang in the intervals. Framed by mouldings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for the decoration of a horizontal panel", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Pen and black ink on paper with brush and ink wash. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-33.
